org.forgerock.opendj.ldap

Interface Function<M,N,P>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of input values transformed by this function.
    N - The type of output values return by this function.
    P - The type of the additional parameter to this function's apply method. Use Void for functions that do not need an additional parameter.

    public interface Function<M,N,P>
    Functions transform input values of type M to output values of type N.

    A Function can be passed to an AttributeParser in order to facilitate parsing of attributes. Common implementations can be found in the Functions class.

    See Also:
    Functions, AttributeParser

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      N apply(M value, P p)
      Applies this function to the provided input value of type M , returning an output value of type N.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        N apply(M value,
      P p)
        Applies this function to the provided input value of type M , returning an output value of type N.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to be transformed.
        p - A function specified parameter.
        Returns:
        The result of the transformation.
